name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Income support of Rs. 6000 per year for small and marginal farmers.

name: PM Mudra Yojana
description: Collateral free loans up to 10 Lakhs for small business and startups.

name: PM Awas Yojana (Gramin)
description: Financial assistance for constructing pucca houses in rural areas.

name: PM Ujjwala Yojana
description: Free LPG connection for women from BPL households.

name: Ayushman Bharat (PM-JAY)
description: Health insurance cover of Rs. 5 Lakhs per family per year.

name: PM SVANidhi
description: Working capital loan for street vendors.

name: PM Vishwakarma
description: Support for traditional artisans and craftspeople with loans and training.

name: Atal Pension Yojana
description: Guaranteed monthly pension for citizens in the unorganized sector.

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Small deposit scheme for the girl child's education and marriage.

name: Stand Up India
description: Loans for SC/ST and women entrepreneurs for greenfield enterprises.

name: PM Matru Vandana Yojana
description: Maternity benefit for pregnant and lactating mothers.

name: National Social Assistance Programme (Old Age Pension)
description: Monthly pension for elderly living below the poverty line.

name: PM Jan Dhan Yojana
description: Universal access to banking services with overdraft and insurance.

name: PM Suraksha Bima Yojana
description: Accidental insurance of Rs. 2 Lakhs at a premium of Rs. 20 per year.

name: PM Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana
description: Life insurance cover of Rs. 2 Lakhs.

name: PM Kaushal Vikas Yojana
description: Skill certification scheme to enable youth to take up industry-relevant training.

name: PM Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
description: Subsidy linked credit scheme for setting up new micro-enterprises.

name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana
description: Placement-linked skill training for rural poor youth.

name: PM Fasal Bima Yojana
description: Crop insurance for farmers against natural calamities.

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme
description: Financial support for apprenticeship training in industries.

name: Lakshmir Bhandar
description: Monthly financial assistance for women from West Bengal households.

name: Karma Sathi Prakalpa
description: Subsidized loan up to 2 Lakhs for unemployed youth to start business.

name: Jai Johar (ST Pension)
description: Monthly pension of Rs. 1000 for Scheduled Tribe elderly.

name: Bandhu Prakalpa (SC Pension)
description: Monthly pension of Rs. 1000 for Scheduled Caste elderly.

name: Kanyashree Prakalpa
description: Financial aid for girl students to prevent child marriage and encourage education.

name: Rupashree Prakalpa
description: One-time financial grant of Rs. 25,000 for marriage of poor girls.

name: Sabooj Sathi
description: Distribution of bicycles to students of Class 9 to 12.

name: Swasthya Sathi
description: Smart card-based health insurance of Rs. 5 Lakhs for all citizens of West Bengal.

name: Student Credit Card
description: Loan up to 10 Lakhs for higher education with low interest rate.

name: Krishak Bandhu
description: Financial assistance and death benefit for farmers in West Bengal.

name: Yuvashree
description: Unemployment assistance of Rs. 1500 per month for enrolled job seekers.

name: Gati Dhara
description: Subsidy up to 1 Lakh for buying commercial vehicles to create self-employment.

name: Bhabishyat Credit Card
description: Financial assistance and loans up to 5 Lakhs for young entrepreneurs.

name: Aikyashree
description: Scholarships for minority students in West Bengal.

name: Shikshashree
description: Financial assistance for SC/ST students in Class 5 to 8.

name: Nijo Griha Nijo Bhumi
description: Distribution of 5 decimals of land to landless rural families.

name: Manabik Pension Scheme
description: Monthly pension of Rs. 1000 for persons with 40% or more disability.

name: Bina Mulya Samajik Suraksha Yojana
description: Free social security benefits for unorganized sector workers.

name: Khadya Sathi
description: Subsidized food grains for 90% of West Bengal's population.

name: Lokshilpi Pension
description: Monthly pension for registered folk artists of West Bengal.
